# Enable AI to control your browser 🤖

[Permalink: Enable AI to control your browser 🤖](https://github.com/browser-use/browser-use#enable-ai-to-control-your-browser-)

[![GitHub stars](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/0f19403bd69bc9dd8ab794fa4cce28d24300bfd37881d117c0b68e001bc86418/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f6769746875622f73746172732f67726567707230372f62726f777365722d7573653f7374796c653d736f6369616c)](https://github.com/gregpr07/browser-use/stargazers)[![Discord](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/3d2c750e6207adb7f3fe4b1ed35677bc0b7a12e67bbd3d5e6678a1de6df4c217/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f646973636f72642f313330333734393232303834323334303431323f636f6c6f723d373238394441266c6162656c3d446973636f7264266c6f676f3d646973636f7264266c6f676f436f6c6f723d7768697465)](https://link.browser-use.com/discord)[![Cloud](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/da9350dbaad0c571888c174efb66b7798a6a02b219334f1ed1a4669339897ca8/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f62616467652f436c6f75642d2545322539382538312545462542382538462d626c7565)](https://cloud.browser-use.com/)[![Documentation](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/7f6d88507e659f89eb75356e49b3e34237a3118de06ec289f5b8614eef0db6ce/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f62616467652f446f63756d656e746174696f6e2d2546302539462539332539352d626c7565)](https://docs.browser-use.com/)[![Twitter Follow](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/43ecab07dd115c164a7cddcc48ac1f2cf29fac3feb0fea9622075c0345a80083/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f747769747465722f666f6c6c6f772f477265676f723f7374796c653d736f6369616c)](https://x.com/gregpr07)[![Twitter Follow](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/cc71749cd2ee32cde0bbd96d99c062c14ccfaed867d2d9c5766d4c955352e130/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f747769747465722f666f6c6c6f772f4d61676e75733f7374796c653d736f6369616c)](https://x.com/mamagnus00)[![Weave Badge](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://app.workweave.ai/reports/repository/org_T5Pvn3UBswTHIsN1dWS3voPg/881458615)

🌐 Browser-use is the easiest way to connect your AI agents with the browser.

💡 See what others are building and share your projects in our [Discord](https://link.browser-use.com/discord)! Want Swag? Check out our [Merch store](https://browsermerch.com/).

🌤️ Skip the setup - try our **hosted version** for instant browser automation! **[Try the cloud ☁︎](https://cloud.browser-use.com/)**.

# Quick start

[Permalink: Quick start](https://github.com/browser-use/browser-use#quick-start)

With pip (Python>=3.11):

```
pip install browser-use
```

Install Playwright:

```
playwright install chromium
```

Spin up your agent:

```
from langchain_openai import ChatOpenAI
from browser_use import Agent
import asyncio
from dotenv import load_dotenv
load_dotenv()

async def main():
    agent = Agent(
        task="Compare the price of gpt-4o and DeepSeek-V3",
        llm=ChatOpenAI(model="gpt-4o"),
    )
    await agent.run()

asyncio.run(main())
```

Add your API keys for the provider you want to use to your `.env` file.

```
OPENAI_API_KEY=
ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=
AZURE_ENDPOINT=
AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY=
GEMINI_API_KEY=
DEEPSEEK_API_KEY=
```

For other settings, models, and more, check out the [documentation 📕](https://docs.browser-use.com/).

### Test with UI

[Permalink: Test with UI](https://github.com/browser-use/browser-use#test-with-ui)

You can test [browser-use with a UI repository](https://github.com/browser-use/web-ui)

Or simply run the gradio example:

```
uv pip install gradio

```

```
python examples/ui/gradio_demo.py
```

# Demos

[Permalink: Demos](https://github.com/browser-use/browser-use#demos)

[Task](https://github.com/browser-use/browser-use/blob/main/examples/use-cases/shopping.py): Add grocery items to cart, and checkout.

[![AI Did My Groceries](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/67061560/410923398-d9359085-bde6-41d4-aa4e-6520d0221872.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..PmulJHUux2ZecfgY9L7lXllLcjm7LptTMahYSG0uwxE)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L2Ya9PYNns8)[![AI Did My Groceries](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/67061560/410923398-d9359085-bde6-41d4-aa4e-6520d0221872.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..PmulJHUux2ZecfgY9L7lXllLcjm7LptTMahYSG0uwxE)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L2Ya9PYNns8)[Open in new window](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L2Ya9PYNns8)

Prompt: Add my latest LinkedIn follower to my leads in Salesforce.

[![LinkedIn to Salesforce](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/67061560/410929479-1440affc-a552-442e-b702-d0d3b277b0ae.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..fHBJrV64mhYE6hCbfMdsjHhRQTjwv_yCq5LIKE-KBEw)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/67061560/410929479-1440affc-a552-442e-b702-d0d3b277b0ae.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..fHBJrV64mhYE6hCbfMdsjHhRQTjwv_yCq5LIKE-KBEw)[![LinkedIn to Salesforce](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/67061560/410929479-1440affc-a552-442e-b702-d0d3b277b0ae.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..fHBJrV64mhYE6hCbfMdsjHhRQTjwv_yCq5LIKE-KBEw)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/67061560/410929479-1440affc-a552-442e-b702-d0d3b277b0ae.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..fHBJrV64mhYE6hCbfMdsjHhRQTjwv_yCq5LIKE-KBEw)[Open in new window](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/67061560/410929479-1440affc-a552-442e-b702-d0d3b277b0ae.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..fHBJrV64mhYE6hCbfMdsjHhRQTjwv_yCq5LIKE-KBEw)

[Prompt](https://github.com/browser-use/browser-use/blob/main/examples/use-cases/find_and_apply_to_jobs.py): Read my CV & find ML jobs, save them to a file, and then start applying for them in new tabs, if you need help, ask me.'

apply.to.jobs.8x.mp4

[Prompt](https://github.com/browser-use/browser-use/blob/main/examples/browser/real_browser.py): Write a letter in Google Docs to my Papa, thanking him for everything, and save the document as a PDF.

[![Letter to Papa](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/67061560/398959783-242ade3e-15bc-41c2-988f-cbc5415a66aa.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..sygMPvfpmRKfcaGwcRqfHvnHJo7vZJ1PkcdgoZx7QQg)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/67061560/398959783-242ade3e-15bc-41c2-988f-cbc5415a66aa.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..sygMPvfpmRKfcaGwcRqfHvnHJo7vZJ1PkcdgoZx7QQg)[![Letter to Papa](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/67061560/398959783-242ade3e-15bc-41c2-988f-cbc5415a66aa.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..sygMPvfpmRKfcaGwcRqfHvnHJo7vZJ1PkcdgoZx7QQg)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/67061560/398959783-242ade3e-15bc-41c2-988f-cbc5415a66aa.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..sygMPvfpmRKfcaGwcRqfHvnHJo7vZJ1PkcdgoZx7QQg)[Open in new window](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/67061560/398959783-242ade3e-15bc-41c2-988f-cbc5415a66aa.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..sygMPvfpmRKfcaGwcRqfHvnHJo7vZJ1PkcdgoZx7QQg)

[Prompt](https://github.com/browser-use/browser-use/blob/main/examples/custom-functions/save_to_file_hugging_face.py): Look up models with a license of cc-by-sa-4.0 and sort by most likes on Hugging face, save top 5 to file.

# Vision

[Permalink: Vision](https://github.com/browser-use/browser-use#vision)

Tell your computer what to do, and it gets it done.

## Roadmap

[Permalink: Roadmap](https://github.com/browser-use/browser-use#roadmap)

### Agent

[Permalink: Agent](https://github.com/browser-use/browser-use#agent)

- [ ]  Improve agent memory (summarize, compress, RAG, etc.)
- [ ]  Enhance planning capabilities (load website specific context)
- [ ]  Reduce token consumption (system prompt, DOM state)

### DOM Extraction

[Permalink: DOM Extraction](https://github.com/browser-use/browser-use#dom-extraction)

- [ ]  Improve extraction for datepickers, dropdowns, special elements
- [ ]  Improve state representation for UI elements

### Rerunning tasks

[Permalink: Rerunning tasks](https://github.com/browser-use/browser-use#rerunning-tasks)

- [ ]  LLM as fallback
- [ ]  Make it easy to define workflow templates where LLM fills in the details
- [ ]  Return playwright script from the agent

### Datasets

[Permalink: Datasets](https://github.com/browser-use/browser-use#datasets)

- [ ]  Create datasets for complex tasks
- [ ]  Benchmark various models against each other
- [ ]  Fine-tuning models for specific tasks

### User Experience

[Permalink: User Experience](https://github.com/browser-use/browser-use#user-experience)

- [ ]  Human-in-the-loop execution
- [ ]  Improve the generated GIF quality
- [ ]  Create various demos for tutorial execution, job application, QA testing, social media, etc.

## Contributing

[Permalink: Contributing](https://github.com/browser-use/browser-use#contributing)

We love contributions! Feel free to open issues for bugs or feature requests. To contribute to the docs, check out the `/docs` folder.

## Local Setup

[Permalink: Local Setup](https://github.com/browser-use/browser-use#local-setup)

To learn more about the library, check out the [local setup 📕](https://docs.browser-use.com/development/local-setup).

`main` is the primary development branch with frequent changes. For production use, install a stable [versioned release](https://github.com/browser-use/browser-use/releases) instead.

* * *

## Cooperations

[Permalink: Cooperations](https://github.com/browser-use/browser-use#cooperations)

We are forming a commission to define best practices for UI/UX design for browser agents.
Together, we're exploring how software redesign improves the performance of AI agents and gives these companies a competitive advantage by designing their existing software to be at the forefront of the agent age.

Email [Toby](mailto:tbiddle@loop11.com?subject=I%20want%20to%20join%20the%20UI/UX%20commission%20for%20AI%20agents&body=Hi%20Toby%2C%0A%0AI%20found%20you%20in%20the%20browser-use%20GitHub%20README.%0A%0A) to apply for a seat on the committee.

[Permalink: Swag](https://github.com/browser-use/browser-use#swag)

Want to show off your Browser-use swag? Check out our [Merch store](https://browsermerch.com/). Good contributors will receive swag for free 👀.

@software{browser_use2024,

  year = {2024},

## About

Make websites accessible for AI agents


[browser-use.com](https://browser-use.com/ "https://browser-use.com")
